edu.ncsu.csc316.compression_manager.compressor

Class Compressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc316.compression_manager.compressor.Compressor

  • public class Compressor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class takes in a file that needs to be compressed. The class reads through the file, picking out words as it reads and uses the move to front hueristic for efficient searching of words.
    Author:
    John Ruisi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Compressor(java.lang.String file)
      Constructor assigns the file name to its private variable and intializes the ArrayList and LinkedList

        public java.lang.String getFile()

        file the file to be compressed

      • compress

        public void compress()
              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        The compress method reads in every line of text and converts it into an array of characters. Each array is sent to the detect() method to detect words or symbols inside the array. Once every line has been searched for words and symbols, the text list gets sent to be written out to a file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file does not exist or cannot be created

      • isLetter

        public boolean isLetter(char c)
        Uses a java regular expression to determine if a character is a letter
        Parameters:
        c - the character to be tested
        Returns:
        true if the character is a letter

      • isSymbol

        public boolean isSymbol(char c)
        Uses a java regular expression to determine if a character is a symbol
        Parameters:
        c - the character to be tested
        Returns:
        true if the character is a symbol

      • lookUp

        public void lookUp(java.lang.String word)
        The lookUp method uses the move to front hueristic. Whenever a word is found in the file, it is added to the front of the list which allows for easier searching since most common words will be at the front.
        Parameters:
        word - the words to be looked up

      • detect

        public void detect(char[] c)
        Iterates through the entire length of the char array to detect a word or symbol. Since only symbols seperates words, whenever a symbol is found, the word that was created before the symbol is found is sent to the lookUp() method.
        Parameters:
        c - the array of characters to detect words and symbols from

      • getOutFile

        public java.lang.String getOutFile(java.lang.String file)
        Returns the file name in a syntax that will allow it to be written without problem.
        Parameters:
        file - the file that was compressed
        Returns:
        b the file to be written
